duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead usability projects for medical products, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.
Apply usability methodologies to enhance patient and staff experience, from initial research to formative and summative evaluations.
Initiate and conduct analysis and research to generate insights for solution creation and redesign recommendations.
Facilitate collaboration between design and business stakeholders, guiding and mentoring junior team members.
Independently lead complex projects and influence the environment for project success.
Adhere to FDA regulations, usability standards, quality system regulations, risk management process, and agile product development.
Contribute to the Usability Center of Excellence by adopting and promoting internal usability guidelines and knowledge management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Design, Industrial Design, Human Factors Engineering (HFE), Human Computer Interaction (HCI)
